ideas.title: This week on How I AI: How Webflow’s CPO built an AI chief of staff
ideas.description: Your weekly listens from How I AI, part of the Lenny's Podcast Network
hooks: Build Your AI Chief of Staff in 5 Steps

tips: Use screen recording to demonstrate each step visually
Include chapter markers for easy navigation
Use picture-in-picture to show personal commentary alongside technical demonstration

visualDirection.description: High-contrast tech aesthetic with electric blue and charcoal gray. Dynamic motion graphics illustrating workflow steps. Clean, geometric typography with technical precision. Animated process diagrams with smooth transitions. Minimalist design with technical depth, referencing Apple design language and modern UI/UX trends.

exampleOutline: Introduction: Why AI Chief of Staff Matters
Context: Current Workflow Limitations
Step-by-Step AI Assistant Build Process
Pro Tips and Advanced Configurations
Implementation Strategy and Next Steps

ideas.title: How to use the new ChatGPT app integrations, including DoorDash, Spotify, Uber, and others
ideas.description: Learn how to use Spotify, Canva, Figma, Expedia, and other apps directly in ChatGPT.
hooks: AI Apps Just Got Insanely Powerful: Here's How
ChatGPT's Secret Superpower: App Integrations Revealed
5 Mind-Blowing ChatGPT App Tricks You Didn't Know

tips: Use screen recording with clear cursor tracking
Create dynamic chapter markers for easy navigation

visualDirection.description: High-energy tech aesthetic with electric blue and deep purple color palette. Dynamic motion graphics highlighting app connections. Clean, sharp typography with technical overlay animations. Futuristic UI transitions between app demonstrations. Minimal but high-contrast design emphasizing information flow and connectivity.

exampleOutline: Intro: Teaser of ChatGPT's new app integration capabilities
Context: Why app integrations matter for productivity
Walkthrough: Detailed demonstrations of Spotify, Canva, Figma, Expedia integrations
Pro Tips: Advanced strategies for maximizing app connections
Conclusion: Future of AI-powered app interactions

ideas.title: VCs predict strong enterprise AI adoption next year — again

hooks: VCs Spill: Enterprise AI's Shocking 2026 Predictions
AI Funding Secrets: What VCs Really Think
Inside VC Boardrooms: The Future of Enterprise AI

tips: Enable live chat for real-time audience engagement
Prepare pre-submitted audience questions in advance
Use multi-screen setup to show source materials and speaker

exampleOutline: Section 1: High-Energy Live Stream Intro & Audience Welcome
Section 2: TechCrunch Report Context & Key Findings

ideas.title: How Webflow’s CPO built an AI chief of staff to manage her calendar, prep for meetings, and drive AI adoption | Rachel Wolan
ideas.description: Watch now | 🎙️ The CPO’s custom AI chief-of-staff app helps prep for meetings, audit her calendar, and level up her entire organization
hooks: How AI became her ultimate executive assistant
The secret weapon of a Fortune 500 CPO
Building an AI chief of staff from scratch

tips: Use cinematic B-roll of tech workspaces and AI interfaces
Include dynamic lower-thirds with data visualization
Create chapter markers for key narrative moments

visualDirection.description: High-contrast tech-noir aesthetic with deep blues and electric teals, sharp geometric typography, fluid motion graphics transitioning between interview, screen capture, and conceptual AI visualization scenes. Aesthetic blend of 'Her' movie meets Apple design documentary - sleek, intelligent, slightly futuristic.

exampleOutline: Opening: Rachel Wolan's personal AI transformation story
The productivity challenge in modern tech leadership
Technical walkthrough of custom AI chief of staff build
Organizational impact and AI adoption insights

ideas.title: Big Tech basically took Trump’s unpredictable trade war lying down
ideas.description: Big Tech basically took Trump’s unpredictable trade war lying down
hooks: Tech Giants' Silent Surrender: Trump's Trade War Exposed
How Big Tech Rolled Over During Trade Tensions
Unpacking Silicon Valley's Shocking Trade War Compliance

tips: Prepare interactive poll questions about trade war impacts
Use live chat to crowdsource audience trade war experiences
Have backup screen recordings of key trade policy moments

visualDirection.description: High-contrast geopolitical infographic style with dynamic data visualizations. Red and navy color palette suggesting tension. Animated world map showing trade flow disruptions. Bold, angular typography with sharp-edged motion graphics. Incorporate stock footage of tech headquarters and trade negotiations as B-roll.

exampleOutline: Opening: Live intro with real-time audience engagement
Trade War Context: Historical setup and key players
Big Tech's Response: Detailed analysis of corporate strategies
Deeper Implications: Long-term economic and technological impacts
Q&A Session: Live audience interaction and expert insights
